mapper.sql: live_user_id, user_id, live_activity, user_real_name, user_telephone, user_create_time, user_update_time, user_upload_img, user_is_like
mapper.select:
select lu.live_user_id, lu.user_id, lu.live_activity,lu.user_real_name, lu.user_telephone, lu.user_create_time, lu.user_update_time, lu.user_upload_img, lu.user_is_like, u.USER_NAME,u.USER_HEAD_IMG_URL
from ccp_live_user lu
left join cms_terminal_user u on lu.user_id = u.user_id
where lu.live_user_id = #{liveUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(*)
from ccp_live_user lu
where 1=1
and lu.live_activity = #{liveActivity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and lu.user_is_like = 1

select count(*)
from ccp_live_user lu
where 1=1
and live_activity = #{liveActivity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and (user_upload_img is not null and user_upload_img != '')

select lu.live_user_id, lu.user_id,lu.user_upload_img,lu.user_create_time, lu.user_update_time, u.USER_NAME,u.USER_HEAD_IMG_URL
,(CASE WHEN lu.user_id= #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS a
from ccp_live_user lu
left join cms_terminal_user u on lu.user_id = u.user_id
where 1=1
and lu.live_activity = #{liveActivity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and (lu.user_upload_img is not null and lu.user_upload_img != '')
order by a DESC , lu.`user_update_time` DESC
limit ${resultFirst},${resultSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into ccp_live_user
live_user_id,
user_id,
live_activity,
user_real_name,
user_telephone,
user_create_time,
user_update_time,
user_upload_img,
user_is_like,
#{liveUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{liveActivity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{userUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{userUploadImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userIsLike,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update ccp_live_user
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
live_activity = #{liveActivity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_real_name = #{userRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_telephone = #{userTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_create_time = #{userCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_update_time = #{userUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_upload_img = #{userUploadImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_is_like = #{userIsLike,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where live_user_id = #{liveUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ccp_live_user set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, live_activity = #{liveActivity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_real_name = #{userRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_telephone = #{userTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_create_time = #{userCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_update_time = #{userUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_upload_img = #{userUploadImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_is_like = #{userIsLike,jdbcType=INTEGER} where live_user_id = #{liveUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
